store_info.about_short: Family-owned sporting goods in Braxton County since 2008. Filling freezers, not trophy cases.
store_info.flood_story:
We've been here since 2008.

Started in Fayetteville. Moved to Hico - couldn't make it. Moved to Birch River in 2013. Then June 23, 2016 happened.

The flood hit Birch River hard. Record water levels. Old Route 19 collapsed. We lost $70,000 in inventory overnight. FEMA said no - Braxton County wasn't on their list. Then someone broke in and took another $10,000.

We moved to this corner lot, started smaller, and kept going. Today we own this building and every single thing in it. No debt. No landlord. Just us.

When a door closes, look for the blessing. God is good.

services.name: FFL Transfers
services.short_description: Transfer firearms purchased online to our store
services.description:
We're a licensed Type 02 FFL dealer. Bring your online firearm purchase here for legal transfer.

**Process:**
1. Buy firearm online, ship to our FFL
2. We notify you when it arrives
3. Complete ATF Form 4473 in-store
4. Pass NICS background check
5. Take your firearm home

services.name: Hunting & Fishing Licenses
services.description:
Skip the line at Walmart. We're an authorized WVDNR license agent.

**Available:**
- Resident/Non-resident hunting
- Resident/Non-resident fishing
- Combination licenses
- Trout stamps
- National Forest stamps

services.name: Buy/Sell/Trade Firearms
services.short_description: Fair prices for your used firearms
services.description: As a Type 02 FFL, we can buy and sell used firearms legally. Bring in your firearm for a fair cash offer or trade value. No appointment needed.
